SUB_W14_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
What in the world? These are the visions we see
at the end of the waves, but there are so many!
I wonder if any will lead to triangles.

SUB_W14_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Yeah, it sure ain't what we're used to seein'.
This chamber is huge, but full'a nothin'—
how could so many visions take place here?

SUB_W14_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.text:
We're always looking to visions to lead us
to clues, but now it seems we need a clue
to point us toward the right vision.

SUB_W14_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_03.text:
This is givin' me a dang headache.
Let's just try to get through it by
doin' what we always do.

SUB_W14_WRLD_BOFO_SCAN_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_WRLD_BOFO_SCAN_000_CUT_000_000.text:
That chair looks a mite suspicious.
Let's take a closer look.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_000.text:
Why, if it isn't Bonnie and Formina.
What brings you to Providence?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_010.text: How do you know our names? ...Wait, are we famous!?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_011.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_011.text: Please ignore her. Who are you?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_020.text:
My, but you do enjoy asking questions!
Or perhaps you merely take some
special interest in me?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: Formina_Franklyn

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_040.text:
A shrewd question, as expected. But of course,
finding such things is the field of expertise for
you and Bonnie Blair—not for me.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_050.text:
Sounds like we got us invitation to search
as we please. Let's get to it, Formina!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_060.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_100_CUT_000_060.text:
Search all you like—for I cannot wait
to see if finding your triangles will
truly be so easy as all that!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_200_CUT_000_000.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_200_CUT_000_000.text:
It is just as I told you, no? Finding a triangle
is not so easy a matter here—or perhaps you
have simply discovered the joys of watching
the countless visions instead?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_200_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_200_CUT_000_010.text:
Well, it sure ain't every day we're treated
to such a massive buffet of visions—but
I still reckon we'll find it soon enough.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_200_CUT_000_011.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_200_CUT_000_011.text:
I hope you're right, Bonnie; I don't want
to be hobbling out of here as an old lady
by the time we finally find the right one.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_200_CUT_000_020.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_200_CUT_000_020.text:
Then please, watch all you desire—
for that is surely why you were
guided to this place. Heh heh.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_200_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_200_CUT_000_030.text:
That one's plannin' somethin', mark my words;
ain't no reason for her to be so cryptic otherwise.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_210_CUT_000_000.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_210_CUT_000_000.text:
Ah, it seems you've discovered the joys
of watching visions. Perhaps someone has
finally appeared who understands my own
feelings for them? How wonderful!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_210_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_210_CUT_000_010.text: We've found our triangle, but I don't see any reason to rush out of here. I mean, not that I'm enjoying peeping into all of these people's lives, but...

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_210_CUT_000_020.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_210_CUT_000_020.text:
You needn't justify yourself to me,
Formina Franklyn! For I admit freely
that I derive nothing but the greatest
of enjoyment from observing visions.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_210_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_210_CUT_000_030.text:
If that's true, you should tell your face—
'cause you don't seem to be enjoyin' yourself
one bit from where I'm standin'.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_300_CUT_000_000.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_300_CUT_000_000.text:
Getting flustered that we still haven't won
a triangle's power, are we? Well, don't worry—
there should be an opportunity soon enough.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_300_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_300_CUT_000_010.text:
Well, that's a relief! To be honest, I was
gettin' a mite bit antsy even though there
are still so many visions to see.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_300_CUT_000_011.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_300_CUT_000_011.text:
Actually, this is a good time for us to stop
and think about the visions; it's possible
there was some hint about the mystery
of the triangles contained within them.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_300_CUT_000_020.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_300_CUT_000_020.text:
As someone who only ever observes, I cannot
say such an idea has ever occurred to me,
Formina Franklyn. These visions have never
struck me as containing any sort of meaning.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_300_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_300_CUT_000_030.text:
Is sittin' here watchin' visions your whole
dang job? Are you just some dodderin' old
grannie under that mask of yours?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_310_CUT_000_000.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_310_CUT_000_000.text: Are you enjoying yourselves, Bonnie and Formina? We can be honest here, the three of us; you can admit nothing is more entertaining than watching visions of others! Or perhaps such things are not exciting enough for a pair of young Capitol City residents. Do you perhaps find them lacking?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_310_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_310_CUT_000_010.text:
I'm starting to think watching all these
visions has left you emotionally numb. That would explain why you never feel a desire
to help the people you see no matter what
kind of terrible crises they face.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_310_CUT_000_020.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_310_CUT_000_020.text:
The visions I see represent but an
infinitesimally small portion of events
which occur in all the Conjoined Worlds,
Formina Franklyn. Do you truly think that reaching out a
helping hand on the occasions it strikes
my fancy will accomplish anything at all?
No. That is a ridiculous thought.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_310_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_CHAIR_310_CUT_000_030.text:
We ain't sayin' you gotta save everybody,
but neither of us see the harm in pitchin'
in from time to time.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_000_CUT_00.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_000_CUT_00.text: That is the question, isn't it.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_000_CUT_00.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_000_CUT_00.text:
Formina Franklyn. Bonnie Blair.
This is where you die.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_000_CUT_00.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_000_CUT_00.text:
You believed what I said, and chose to continue
watching the visions. So now you bear witness
to your last and final vision—for your fate has
already been sealed.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_000_CUT_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_000_CUT_00.text:
Looks like we got lured into the trap.
Still, I think we'll go ahead and let
that vision remain a vision. After all, visions show us only a single
possibility—and once we're clapping the
cuffs on you, our future will change.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_000_CUT_00.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_000_CUT_00.text:
How absurd. Your final moments might
play out in various ways, but the end
result ever remains the same. I have watched this vision time and again;
your fates were set the moment you arrived
here in Providence.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_000_CUT_00.text:
We may be in for one heck of a tussle here,
but neither of us are any good at knowin'
when to throw in the towel. So if a tussle is what it's gotta be,
we'll tussle right to the end!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_000_CUT_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_000_CUT_01.text:
Still think you know when and how
we're supposed to die, pardner?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_000_CUT_01.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_000_CUT_01.text:
Is this even possible? Are you claiming
you can reverse even your own visions?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_000_CUT_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_000_CUT_01.text:
They're our visions, darlin', which means we
can do whatever the heck we want with 'em!
Besides, changin' our visions should be a
whole lot easier than changin' other folks'.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_000_CUT_01.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_000_CUT_01.text: But at some point you will have to confront the fate of the worlds, for the overturning of a destiny always comes at great cost. So I will continue watching you both, for I wish to see the surprise on your faces when that bill finally comes due.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_000_CUT_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_000_CUT_01.text:
Whatever wags your tail, hon.
We'll see you around.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_010_CUT_01.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_010_CUT_01.text:
I envied you both—and even thought
one of you might finally be the one
to change the way I live. And it turns out I was correct: I meddled
in a vision for the first and last time,
and used it to guide your wave to
this very door.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_010_CUT_01.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_010_CUT_01.text:
I have been watching you for ages,
and know you possess countless futures. So worry not, Formina Franklyn and
Bonnie Blair! Instead, believe in your
waves and keep moving forward.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_010_CUT_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_010_CUT_01.text:
You called us here and guided us through
all that in order to bring this to an end?
I don't know how I feel about all of this,
even though we did find a triangle.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_020_CUT_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_020_CUT_01.text:
See? Sometimes it pays to fight
to the bitter end.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_020_CUT_01.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_020_CUT_01.text:
Is this how you've always gone about things,
Bonnie Blair and Formina Franklyn?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_020_CUT_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_020_CUT_01.text:
I know we probably have more losses than
wins at this point, but you can't change your
circumstances if you stay on the defensive.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_020_CUT_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_020_CUT_01.text:
So heck, why not go on offense yourself?
Although I imagine you got all sorts of
circumstances standin' in your way.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_020_CUT_01.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_020_CUT_01.text:
Indeed I do. I cannot allow myself
to follow only your destinies,
for the visions I see are legion.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_020_CUT_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_020_CUT_01.text:
You ain't, like, a god or
something, are you?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_020_CUT_01.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_020_CUT_01.text:
If creating the world makes one a 'god,'
then I do not qualify. I simply watch,
as I shall continue to do until the
Conjoined Worlds meet their end.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_020_CUT_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_020_CUT_01.text:
Then I hope you keep watching over us,
because every now and then, we're going
to turn and wave—and I wouldn't want
you to miss that for the world.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_020_CUT_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_020_CUT_01.text:
Not sure I feel altogether comfortable doin'
all the stupid stuff we been doin' now that
I know we're being watched.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_020_CUT_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_020_CUT_01.text:
I never took you as the sort to care
about what people thought, Bonnie.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_020_CUT_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_020_CUT_01.text:
I'm a real sensitive gal, Formina.
You wouldn't understand.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_020_CUT_01.speaker: ProvidenceWatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOFO_020_CUT_01.text:
Oh, I will be watching you and Bonnie Blair
until the bitter end, Formina Franklyn.

SUB_W14_WRLD_BOFO_WQUEST_INITIAL_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_WRLD_BOFO_WQUEST_INITIAL_000_CUT.text:
These are the visions that the waves
guide us to, but there are so many!

SUB_W14_WRLD_BOFO_WQUEST_INITIAL_000_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_WRLD_BOFO_WQUEST_INITIAL_000_CUT.text:
But this time, the waves ain't connected
to 'em, so I reckon they ain't ours.
Think they maybe belong to other folks?

SUB_W14_SCAN_BOFO_WQUEST_1ST_SCAN_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_SCAN_BOFO_WQUEST_1ST_SCAN_000_CU.text:
Ain't nothin' normal about that chair.
Let's get us a closer look.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.speaker: Villager
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.text:
Oh, damn it all! I can't believe the
fiends caught up with me when
I was so close to the village!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.speaker: Villager
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.text:
Well, everyone in town is on the brink
of starvation, so I've no choice but to
protect this food with my very life.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.text: Keep running! We have your back!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.speaker: Villager
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.text:
I don't know who you are,
but I owe you big time!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.text:
Let's send these here fiends
to the blue blazes!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.text:
That should keep any fiends
from pursuing that man.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_VILLAGER_000_CU.text:
Let's just hope he don't run into
more trouble down the trail.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.speaker: Villager
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.text:
Oh, damn it all! I can't believe the
fiends caught up with me when
I was so close to the village!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.speaker: Villager
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.text:
I can't die now! I have to get
these medicinal plants back to
my sick little sister!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.text: Keep running! We have your back!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.speaker: Villager
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.text:
Hey, you're the ones who saved me
the other day! Thank you again!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.text: This is as far as you go, fiends!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.text: I hope he made it home okay.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_VILLAGER2_000_C.text: That gent's a right magnet for fiends.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Policeman
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text:
Where the hell is the bomb disposal unit!?
This thing's about to blow, and we'll
never get the civvies out in time!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Policeman
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text:
About damn time, bomb team! Get over here
and stop that detonator already!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text:
But we don't actually know anything
about bomb-disposal protocol!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text:
Then I guess we'll have to learn fast.
You there! We need a sitrep!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Policeman
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text:
The detonator has chips of three colors:
red, blue, and yellow. If you put 'em back
in their original order, it stops the timer.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text: And do you know the original order?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Policeman
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text:
I can't remember it clearly, but I don't
think any of the chips were in the same
position as they are now.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text:
Feller, that hint's about
as useless as they come!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Policeman
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text:
Uh, I think the blue chip was somewhere
to the right of the red chip?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text: All right, let me repeat back.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_00.text:
There are three chips: red, blue, and yellow,
and we need to return them to their initial
order if we want to disarm the bomb. The initial order had all three chips in
different positions than they're in now,
with the blue chip somewhere to the
right of the red one. Clear?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_01.speaker: Policeman
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_01.text:
Thank you so much. You have no idea
how many lives you saved today.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_01.text:
We did it, darlin'! You and me are
a couple'a bomb-disposal prodigies!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_01.text: You know what? We just might be.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_02.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BOMB_000_CUT_02.text:
Well, heck! I can't make
heads or tails of this!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text:
Everyone, please remain calm! There's a whole
herd of fiends out there, but we'll be safe
so long as we stay in this shelter.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Woman
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text:
Excuse me, but has anyone seen my cat!?
I don't see Lady Purrs-A-Lot anywhere,
and I'm afraid she may have run outside!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text:
No, ma'am, I haven't seen your cat,
and I'm afraid I can't let you outside.
Now please just sit down and be calm.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Woman
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text:
Nooo! Lady Purrs-A-Lot!
I have to go find her!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text:
Ma'am, what are you doing!?
Do NOT go outside!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text:
Reckon you should stay here, ma'am.
You're likely to be torn to shreds 
if you head outside now.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Woman
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text:
My sweet little kitty might be outside!
I have to go find her!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text:
Oh, this is just too sad for words.
Let's help her find the cat, Bonnie.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text: Fine, but we search the shelter first.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text: No, you idiots! Don't open the door!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Woman
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text: Well, I suppose it's possible that Lady Purrs-A-Lot is still around here, but I've been searching for a while now...

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_000.text:
Gah! They've broken down the door!
We got fiends incoming, people!
Run for your lives!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_010.text:
All right, ma'am, let's see about
findin' this cat'a yours.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_010.text:
Well, shoot. The poor gal's dead.
Musta got caught up in the fightin'...

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_020.speaker: Woman
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_020.text:
Lady Purrs-A-Lot! There you are!
Oh, Mama has been so worried!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_020.text:
Oh, that's a lovely cat.
May I pet her?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_000_CUT_020.text:
Awww, who's a wittle snuggle bunny?
You are! Yes you are!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Explorer
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
It's been over 10 days since I entered this
sweltering jungle in search of the legendary
Great Beast. My provisions have run out,
and I've now become thoroughly lost. Yes, this may well be
the place I die...

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Explorer
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
The Great Beast! I've found it at last!
I must catch it immediately!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
You tryin' to punch a ticket to boot hill,
feller!? 'Cause that thing's gonna kill you!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Explorer
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
Heavens, there are other people out here!?
Who are you two, and why have you... No, that doesn't matter. I have staked my
very life on capturing the Great Beast,
so I suggest you stay out of my way!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
It's his life to throw away if he wants.
Besides, if he lets it get away, he could
end up regretting it the rest of his life.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
But if he tries to catch it,
he ain't gonna HAVE a rest of his life!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
Rest of his life ended up bein'
a mighty short time.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
His obsession with the creature ran deep.
I almost envy that in a way.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
Hoo-ee! That beast was one tough customer!
No way in heck were you capturin' him alive.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Explorer
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
You fools! You thrice-damned fools!
I came here to CAPTURE the beast,
and you've gone and SLAIN it!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text: Exactly the reaction I was expecting.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
Maybe so, but I'm still ain't gonna
sit back and watch him die!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Explorer
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BEAST_000_CUT_0.text:
My beast... Give me back
my precious beast!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
I feel quite certain the lost treasure of the
Empire is concealed deep within these tunnels,
but I've no idea which fork to take.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
You there! You look like quite
the intuitive young lady!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: You mean me, yes?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Wow, darlin'. Just...wow.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
No, not you! The other one!
Which fork would you choose!?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Wait, he's askin' ME!? Well...

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Right fork's the correct one.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Gotta be the middle fork.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Feels like the left fork to me.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Then I shall defer to your
great wisdom. Tally-ho!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: You sure that's wise, feller?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
The ultimate game of chance.
Ooo, how exciting!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Another fork. Which way this time,
my fine adventuring friend!?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Let's see here...

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Left fork's callin' out to me.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: I'm feelin' the middle fork.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Right fork! Right fork!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Very well. We shall proceed thusly.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
I'm startin' to get a mite
nervous about this.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Eh, I'm sure it'll be fine.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Treasure chests! Three of 'em!
I was right!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Great job, Bonnie!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Eureka! This is, without a doubt,
the lost treasure of the Empire! But according to the literature,
only one chest holds what we seek,
while the others are but fiendish traps.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Hmm? What's this written on the wall?
'The untrodden path will guide you
to the treasure.'

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Hmm? What's this written on the wall?
'The untrodden paths hide traps.'

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Well, friend? Which do you believe
to be the real treasure?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Havin' me pick again, eh? Hmm...

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
'The untrodden path will guide
you to the treasure,' eh...?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
'The untrodden paths hide
the traps,' eh...?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: The real chest's on the left.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: The real chest's in the middle.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: The real chest's on the right.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Huzzah! Nothing to
do now but open it!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Yeee-haw! We found it!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
The lost treasure of the Empire
is mine at last!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Your judgment has served me well,
my dear woman. Thank you so much.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Happy to help, darlin'!
Say, Formina? You reckon that there
treasure's worth a lot of money?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
It did seem rather valuable, yes.
Shame we can't take any of it.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Thought you might say that...

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
Aw, it's empty. But there's somethin'
written on the bottom here...

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
'The punishment for thieves is death.'
That doesn't sound good.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: Earthquake!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text:
It's a trap—the tunnels are collapsing!
Run for it!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: You'll never make it in time!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.speaker: Archaeologist
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_TREASURE_000_CU.text: GAAAAAAHHH!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BIRD_000_CUT_00.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BIRD_000_CUT_00.text:
I'm involved in the preservation of the
wild bird population, and am currently
investigating how many have returned
to these woods due to our efforts.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BIRD_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BIRD_000_CUT_00.text:
A job where you count things all day
sounds like a whole heap'a fun!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BIRD_000_CUT_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BIRD_000_CUT_00.text: There's a large bird flying this way.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BIRD_000_CUT_00.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BIRD_000_CUT_00.text:
Sweet feathers, that's no bird!
It's a fiend!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BIRD_000_CUT_01.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BIRD_000_CUT_01.text:
With that fiend gone, even more wild birds
will now return to our magnificent forests.
You've done a great service to all of our
winged friends this day!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
I am indeed, for an accurate survey of the
bird population is a necessary component
of our environmental-protection efforts.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
Good for you! If it were me, I'd woulda
gotten that there count all twisted up
like an old rope by now.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
966. ...No, wait. That was a fiend.
It doesn't count.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
Ah, and the one before that was a fiend
as well, so let's exclude that.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
Ah, and there are four
more birds over there.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text: Oh! I see six birds there!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
And that makes... Goodness, I've lost
track. Where is the count at now?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
Ah, yes. Thank you. One must always
have an accurate count, after all!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text: Sure glad I didn't mess that up.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text: I don't see any kind of crisis here.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
Er, are you certain? Because I thought...
Aaargh! Talking to you has made me lose
track of the count completely!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
Sorry about that, darlin', but ain't
no reason to lose your hat over it.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Birdwatcher
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text:
Enough! Do not speak to me again.
Now farewell.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BIRD2_000_CUT_0.text: Sir, wait! There's a cliff right over—

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
It's finished! It's finally complete!
A blade with the perfect combination
of flexibility and strength, and a temper
pattern that simply ripples with life! As a swordsmith, this weapon will
surely be my masterpiece!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: All that remains is to give it a name worthy of its majesty. I hereby dub thee...Darkblayde!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: I wouldn't give that name to a hog!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: Yup! That there's a fine name.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: You there! What is your problem?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
Look, I ain't any sorta sword expert,
but that name makes no sense.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: Er, well, now that I hear it out loud, perhaps it is a bit odd. Let me try again. I hereby dub thee...Deathblayde!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: I wouldn't give that name to a hog!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: Yup! That there's a fine name.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: What's your problem now!?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
If I may interject, that name sounds
a tad...goofy? It's like something
from a children's cartoon.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
Maybe try somethin' a little more
'honorable samurai,' and a little
less 'teenage edgelord'?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: Oh? Hmm. Perhaps so. In that case, I hereby dub thee...Dreadblayde!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: I wouldn't give that name to a hog!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: Yup! That there's a fine name.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
Are you even listenin' to our constructive
criticisms here, feller? 'Cause you keep
givin' that thing the same dang name!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
Maybe you could explore positive themes?
What about 'Lightblayde'? Or 'Valorblayde'?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
Shut up, shut up, SHUT UUUUUUP!
I don't even care anymore!
I'm done thinking of names!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
Well heck, feller! You didn't have
to go and break the thing in half!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
This was supposed to be my masterpiece,
and now I can't even stand to look at it!
Get out of my sight, damn you!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
I think we may have pushed
a little too hard there.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
Sure seems that way. Better luck
next time, mister blacksmith.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: Then you will be forevermore known as Darkblayde Hideyoshi!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
Little on the nose, but sure.
Anyway, we're gonna mosey on ba—

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: Then you will be forevermore known as Deathblayde Ieyasu!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
Little on the nose, but sure.
Anyway, we're gonna mosey on ba—

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: Then you will be forevermore known as Dreadblayde Nobunaga!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
Little on the nose, but sure.
Anyway, we're gonna mosey on ba—

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
I am suddenly overcome with an urge
to put this sword's edge to the test...
and your ripe flesh will do nicely!
Bwa ha! Bwaaa ha ha ha!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: Something is VERY wrong with this guy.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: The sword's taken control of him!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Swordsmith
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: What... What have I done!?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text: You don't remember any of that?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_BLACKSMITH_000_.text:
Sure seems that way. How about we
hold on to that sword for you, hon?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Seems like we're inside a body—
and we ain't alone!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: Waaaaaah! Waaaaaah!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
What's a robot doing
in a place like this?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
I fell into the sea and was swallowed
by a giant fish and I wanna get out
of here... Waaah!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
I've heard of some bad spills before,
but that there takes the dang cake!
Don't worry, we'll get you outta here.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: Let's burn stuff to make smoke!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: Let's bash whatever we can!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: Let's just do nothin'.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
See that pile'a trash yonder?
I bet that'd burn real good.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
We're making an exception here because
it's an emergency, but you know little
robots shouldn't play with fire, right?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Yup! But now, when the fish coughs out the
smoke, we take the opportunity to get away!
Gee, you ladies sure are smart!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Found me some matches.
Let's get things cookin'!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: Oh yeah, that's burnin' real good.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: Oh no, ma'ams! Look over there!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
A powder keg? Shoot! If that catches fire,
it'll blow! Put that fire out right quick!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: W-water! We need water!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: Too late, ma'ams! It's too big!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: IT'S GONNA BLOW!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
We need to find some way to make this fish
spit us out. Let's cause havoc in its tummy
till it can't put up with us no more!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: Help us out, all right?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Boy, you ladies sure are smart.
I'll smash it up real good!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: Let's give it a real whuppin'!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Is it working, ma'ams?
Did the fish open its mouth?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Not yet—this thing is tougher
than I thought.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Oh no, ma'ams! There are fiends
coming at us from further down!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Maybe they also wanna cause some havoc?
If so, I'll give 'em all I got!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Panickin' won't help. Times like these
are when it's most important to relax
and keep a cool head.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: You want to relax in a fish's stomach?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Lay down and see for yourself—it actually
ain't that bad! Not exactly a feather bed,
but this is heaven compared to sleepin'
conditions back in the Green Hell.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: Well, if you say so...

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Hoo boy, we actually nodded off!
Hey, Formina, wake up. You're droolin'.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
The fish still hasn't spat us out?
Ugh. UUUGH.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Hey there, hon. Rise and shine.
...Hon? Shoot, he ain't movin'!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: Oh no! The stomach acid melted him! OH NO! LOOK AT US!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text:
Heck! I'm turnin' into goo!
And look at your arm!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_00.text: NOOOOOO! I'M MEEEEEELTING!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_01.speaker: MechBoy
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_01.text: Look! The fish opened its mouth!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_FISH_000_CUT_01.text:
This here's our chance to make a getaway.
You take care not to fall into the ocean
anymore, all right, pardner?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
Perfection! Now that our new security
mech is ready, the city will be safe.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
You there! Ladies! I'm sorry, but could you
help me activate this mech? I don't happen
to have a free hand at the moment.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
You just want us to hit
the power button? Sure.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: Do you see a lever and switch?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: Yes.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
First, pull the lever down.
Next, press the switch three times.
Finally, raise the lever again.
This will activate the mech.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
First, press the switch two times.
Next, lower the lever and press the switch once.
Finally, raise the lever again.
This will activate the mech.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
Lever down, press the switch, lever down?
No, that don't sound right.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
The direction on the last lever was up, right?
Still, it's lever, switch three times, lever.
...Er, I think.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
Switcher, lever, lever? Dangnabbit!
I ain't no good at this sorta thing!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
Switch twice, lever, switch once, lever.
...I think.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
Incidentally, as a safety precaution,
any error in the start-up sequence
will cause the unit to self-destruct.
So do be careful, yes?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
WHAT!? Why in tarnation would
you design the thing like that!?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
When you have three PhDs, you can design
whatever mech you like. Now begin.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: Okay, let's see...

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: Next...

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: Pull the lever.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: Press the switch.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: Success! It's starting up!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
That there was more stressful than ropin' an
angry steer. My hand was sweatin' so much,
I thought I might short the dang mech out!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
Egads, you feckless oafs!
You've just activated the
self-destruct mechanism!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text:
I told you I ain't no good
at this sorta thing!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Doctor
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: WE'RE ALL GOING TO DIIIE!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DOCTOR_000_CUT_.text: NOOOOOO!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_KIGURUMI_000_CU.speaker: Showgirl
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_KIGURUMI_000_CU.text:
Attention, everyone! If you visit our
department store today, you'll get
a chance to meet our popular new
mascot, Spendy McBigbucks!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_KIGURUMI_000_CU.speaker: Showgirl
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_KIGURUMI_000_CU.text:
Come on! Let's give our customers
a warm welcome, Spendy!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_KIGURUMI_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_KIGURUMI_000_CU.text:
That ain't a short guy in a costume!
It's a dang fiend!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_KIGURUMI_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_KIGURUMI_000_CU.text:
Just two gals who turned your little
infomercial into a superhero drama!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text: Oh my gosh, you're late! Don't tell me you forgot that Capitol Cuisine! is airing live today!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text:
You mean the cookin' show? Look, if you're
havin' a security concern, you need to
request help from the police depart—

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text:
We don't have time for this, chef!
Just get in the studio!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text:
Dang it, Formina! Get me outta here!
I ain't runnin' no chuckwagon!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text: Ah, there's nothing better than creating your own meals from scratch. Welcome, friends, to a special live edition of...Capitol Cuisine!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text:
We'll begin with the dough.
What are the ingredients, chef?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text:
We'll begin with a caramel sauce.
What are the ingredients, chef?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text:
Next, we add the toppings.
What are the ingredients, chef?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text:
Next, we make the custard.
What are the ingredients, chef?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text: And now we pop it in the oven.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text: Oooh, I can't wait to try it!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text:
Oh my, that cooked up nicely!
Let's try a little, shall we?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text:
No sir, that's right terrible.
I think I'm gonna hurl!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text: Kill the feed! KILL THE FEEEEEED!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Assistant
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_COOK_000_CUT_00.text: We'll see you all next week on Capitol Cuisine!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Boy
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text:
Are there really ghosts
in this abandoned house?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Girl
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text: Yeah! My brother totally saw one!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text:
Ha ha ha! I'm just messin' around.
Y'all are havin' a real good time
over here, ain'tcha?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text:
Let them have their little
date in peace, Bonnie.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Boy
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text: It's not a date! We're jus— GAAAH!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text:
Nice try, pardner, but I ain't about
to fall for my own trick.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text:
Hmm? Oh, that's not a ghost!
It's just a fiend.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text:
Whee doggie! For a second there,
I almost believed in ghosts.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text:
Well, looks like all the ghosts have gone home
for the night, so it's time you did the same.
I'm sure your parents are worried sick.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Girl
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text:
See? I told you there
were ghosts here!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Boy
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text: I'm sorry. I believe you now.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_KIMODAMESHI_000.text: You two run on home now!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Citizen_A
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: Don't shoot! I'm the real one!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Citizen_B
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: Don't listen to her! I'm the real one!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
Now this don't make a lick'a sense!
What's goin' on, marshal?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Detective
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
I was chasin' down a dangerous alien,
but when I took my eye off it for a second,
it shapeshifted into a goddamn civilian!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Detective
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
Now I can't tell 'em apart!
Which one do I shoot?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: Don't shoot either of 'em!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: Shoot 'em both!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Detective
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
Damn it! I was so close to
gettin' the dirtbag—AND
to my retirement!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Citizen_A
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
How dare you point your gun
at a civilian!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Citizen_B
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
I'm filing an official complaint!
I'll have your badge!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
Don't gimme that look! Heck, it's almost
like you're disappointed you didn't get
to plug anyone today.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Detective
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: The hell did you say!?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
Don't matter which one's the alien.
If you shoot 'em both, you're sure
to get it one way or the other.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Detective
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: Are you out of your goddamn mind!?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
Fine, I'll do it. I ain't half the marksman
Formina is, though, so apologies in advance
if I hit y'all someplace weird and your
deaths are slow and painful.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Citizen_A
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: No, stop! I'm human, I swear!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Citizen_B
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
Is this some kind of joke!?
You can't be serious!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
I'm always serious. Now land sakes,
y'all hold real still now!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Citizen_B
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
This woman is out of her mind...
Well, there's no way I'm going
down without a fight!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text: And that there's the alien!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
Hoo-ee, that's a relief! I was so worried
that gun might accidentally discharge!
See, this is why I prefer to stick to
close-quarters melee combat.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Detective
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
Damn, lady, you sure had me going with
that ruse of yours. But hey, it worked!
You saved the city!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ALIEN_000_CUT_0.text:
Glad to hear it—but there ain't
no way I ever wanna do that again.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Girl
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text:
Maru's my kitty! But I accidently left
a window open and he ran away.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text:
Well then, we'd best find him—
and I actually see a cat over yonder!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text: Hold on. He looks a little twitchy.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text:
Poor thing's probably never been
in the great outdoors before..

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Girl
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text:
Oh no, he ran away!
You're a LIAR, lady!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text: Boy, I sure messed that up.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text: Just like that. Niiice and slooow.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text:
Okay, we're in real close,
but Maru still looks spooked.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Girl
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text:
Oh no, he ran away!
You're a LIAR, lady!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text: Boy, I sure messed that up.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text: Go ahead and pick him up.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text:
Just make sure you don't go
lettin' him out again, y'hear?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.speaker: Girl
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_CAT_CAPT_000_CU.text: I will. Thank you so much!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.speaker: Assassin
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.text:
Red Panther here: I've arrived at the
heart. Moving to eliminate the target.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.speaker: Assassin
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.text:
Sorry, pal. It's just business.
Nothing personal.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.text:
What do you think you're
doin' there, pardner?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.text:
That was a troubling conversation
we just overheard.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.speaker: Assassin
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.text:
My briefing didn't say anything about other
agents. Unless... Aw, hell! Don't tell me the
president's people caught wind of our plans!?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.text:
The president!? Are you an
anti-government operative?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.speaker: Assassin
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.text:
The only answer you'll
get from me is lead!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.text:
I thought he might be with Quisstatium,
but he didn't have any triangles on him.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_ASSASSIN_000_CU.text:
Well at least we protected the president.
That's victory enough for me!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_MERCHANT_000_CU.speaker: Trader
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_MERCHANT_000_CU.text:
Thank you. When I stumbled across those
fiends, I thought I was a dead man.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_MERCHANT_000_CU.speaker: Trader
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_MERCHANT_000_CU.text:
As a merchant, allow me to repay your
kindness with a reward of your choice.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_WATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_WATER_000_CUT_0.text:
But if we look around, I'm sure
we could find some for you.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_WATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_WATER_000_CUT_0.text:
We're in the middle of a desert here.
Outside of an impossibly lucky oasis,
where are we gonna find water?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_WATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_WATER_000_CUT_0.text:
Sure wish there was more we 
could do for you, pardner.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_WATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_WATER_000_CUT_0.text:
Actually, we just got some water
from that merchant.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_WATER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_WATER_000_CUT_0.text:
Heck, I plumb forgot about that!
Here you go, feller. Drink up.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_MESSENGER_000_C.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_MESSENGER_000_C.text:
Impede me not, vile fiends! I must deliver 
this message from the king forthwith,
and my duty shall not be denied!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_MESSENGER_000_C.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_MESSENGER_000_C.text:
We'll handle them fiends.
You run on ahead!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_MESSENGER_000_C.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_MESSENGER_000_C.text:
My heartiest thanks, blessed ladies!
I am ever in your debt!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_MESSENGER_000_C.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_MESSENGER_000_C.text:
Sure hope that feller makes
it safely to his king.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_MESSENGER2_000_.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_MESSENGER2_000_.text:
Fie! To think I might be ensnared by more
fell fiends with the castle near in sight! 
But the peril is no matter; this warning
must reach the king at any cost!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_MESSENGER2_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_MESSENGER2_000_.text:
We'll handle them fiends.
You run on ahead!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_MESSENGER2_000_.speaker: Soldier
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_MESSENGER2_000_.text:
Again!? My debt to you deepens
all the more, brave ser!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_MESSENGER2_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_MESSENGER2_000_.text:
Let's hope there isn't
a third one of these.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.text:
Looks like a fairly standard forest.
I wonder what's here?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.speaker: Witch
Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.text:
You want its claws that bad,
go get 'em your own self.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.speaker: Witch
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.text:
So that's how it is, hm?
Then you leave me no choice.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.text: Bwah! She's siccin' fiends on us!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.text: You scared us half to death!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.text:
You can't make us fight somethin'
just cause you're too lazy to do it!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.speaker: Witch
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_WITCH_000_CUT_0.text:
Oh, don't be so cross! Look, I'll even
give you a potion to compensate.
Which would you like, mmm?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Daughter
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.text:
I was bitten by this horrid snake earlier!
I didn't think it was serious, but the
thing turned out to be venomous,
and now I'm going to DIE!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.text:
She's burnin' up! The poison must've
started workin' through her system.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Daughter
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.text:
Nooo! I'm too pretty to die!
You have to run and get a doctor!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.text:
Stay here and watch over her, Formina!
I'm gonna run like the devil and...

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.text:
We have an antidote, right?
I wonder if that would work.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_VIPER_000_CUT_0.text: Just watch for rattlers. Got it?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text:
What terrible luck to be on the deck
of a ship during such a storm...

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Sailor_A
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text: Ho there, landlubbers! Lend a hand!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Sailor_A
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text:
The ship took a real hit from the storm,
and we've lost both a sailor and a
treasure chest overboard!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Sailor_A
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text:
If we don't pull 'em both up fast,
they'll be at the bottom of the sea!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text:
All right, we got us the treasure.
Next we should...

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Sailor_A
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text: Damn the waves! We're too late!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Sailor_B
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text: Thank you... You saved my life...

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text:
And now for the treasure!
Uh, where'd it go?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Sailor_A
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text: Damn the waves! It took the treasure!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_VISION_DROWN_000_CUT_0.text:
Well at least your friend's alive.
Ain't that what matters?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_001_CUT_000_000.speaker: Man_Overworld_Suit

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_001_CUT_000_030.speaker: Man_Overworld_Suit
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_001_CUT_000_030.text:
Good, for that will achieve
our ends as well.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_001_CUT_000_050.speaker: Man_Overworld_Suit
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_001_CUT_000_050.text:
I thank you, brave bearers of the triangles!
For now I can destroy the barrier around
this most infuriating of worlds!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_001_CUT_000_070.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_001_CUT_000_070.text:
It's just a vision, Bonnie; I'm sure that
man's ambitions have been thwarted.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_002_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_002_CUT_000_000.text:
Let's start with intros! I'm Ameya Aisling,
a witch of the white. Raise your hand if
you're a Watcher who wants a triangle!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_002_CUT_000_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_002_CUT_000_030.text:
Does that even count as watching?
Hm... Not sure what I should do here.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_002_CUT_000_050.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_002_CUT_000_050.text:
That's the might of a Watcher, all right!
Now get out there and protect the magic
of the Conjoined Worlds!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_002_CUT_000_070.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_002_CUT_000_070.text:
It's just a vision, Bonnie.
That isn't the real Ameya.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_002_CUT_000_090.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_002_CUT_000_090.text: Why did you even come here, Watchers?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_002_CUT_100_000.speaker: GreyWitch
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_002_CUT_100_000.text:
Never trust a witch, Watchers. Instead,
know that I, the Grey Witch, will grant
what you seek right now.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_002_CUT_100_030.speaker: GreyWitch
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_002_CUT_100_030.text:
Good, Watchers! Your determination will
decide the destiny of the Conjoined Worlds!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_002_CUT_100_050.speaker: GreyWitch
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_002_CUT_100_050.text:
You have done well. Because of you,
all the worlds will be stained in grey!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_002_CUT_100_060.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_002_CUT_100_060.text: Wait, we didn't never agree to that!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_002_CUT_100_070.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_002_CUT_100_070.text:
It's just a vision, Bonnie.
You can ignore this 'Grey Witch.'

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_002_CUT_100_090.speaker: GreyWitch
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_002_CUT_100_090.text:
It seems I'll have to wait for
the next Watcher to come by.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_003_CUT_000_000.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_003_CUT_000_000.text:
I FINALLY have an audience with the
Dismal King! Oh, I'm so excited!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_003_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_003_CUT_000_020.text: Let's get shed of this place.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_003_CUT_000_030.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_003_CUT_000_030.text:
Hear me, O Dismal King! It is I, Dolores!
I have brought you two who gather triangles!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_003_CUT_000_050.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_003_CUT_000_050.text:
With the Dismal King fallen, our days of
being ruled by the triangle will continue.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_003_CUT_000_060.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_003_CUT_000_060.text: What'n the heck does THAT mean!?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_003_CUT_000_070.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_003_CUT_000_070.text:
It's just a vision, Bonnie.
That isn't the real Dolores.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_003_CUT_100_000.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_003_CUT_100_000.text:
One does not come half-heartedly to challenge
the evil power of the Dismal King. If you have
the strength to fight, we Wardens will aid you,
for it is our desire to see the king laid low.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_003_CUT_100_030.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_003_CUT_100_030.text: Win, and the triangle is yours.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_003_CUT_100_050.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_003_CUT_100_050.text:
The integrity of the Conjoined Worlds has
been preserved. Now we can slumber.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_003_CUT_100_060.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_003_CUT_100_060.text:
The integrity of the Conjoined Worlds?
What does that even mean!?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_003_CUT_100_070.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_003_CUT_100_070.text:
It's just a vision, Bonnie.
Those aren't the real wardens.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_004_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_004_CUT_000_000.text:
I'll relay to ye the words of Deus Maris:
If ye seek the triangle, fight. If not, leave.
End quote. What'll it be, minnows?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_004_CUT_000_030.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_004_CUT_000_030.text: Yar, I expected ye to say that.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_004_CUT_000_040.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_004_CUT_000_040.text:
A sound choice, minnow, for there's
no meaning in yer deaths.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_004_CUT_000_050.speaker: Ivar
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_004_CUT_000_050.text: Yar, as is true with the Quisstatium.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_004_CUT_000_070.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_004_CUT_000_070.text:
It's just a vision, Bonnie.
That isn't the real captain.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_004_CUT_100_000.speaker: Azure
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_004_CUT_100_000.text:
I will relay to you the words of Deus Maris:
If you seek the triangle, fight. If not, leave.
So what'll it be, sailors from an outer ocean?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_004_CUT_100_030.speaker: Azure
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_004_CUT_100_030.text:
You have shown your true colors,
sailors from an outer ocean.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_004_CUT_100_040.speaker: Azure
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_004_CUT_100_040.text: You have done well to know your place.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_004_CUT_100_050.speaker: Azure
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_004_CUT_100_050.text:
Does this mean the curse of
Mare Nostrum will continue?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_004_CUT_100_070.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_004_CUT_100_070.text:
It's just a vision, Bonnie.
That isn't the real Azure.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_004_CUT_100_090.speaker: Azure
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_004_CUT_100_090.text:
The lot of you are no better
than lowly pirates!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_006_CUT_000_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_006_CUT_000_000.text:
If that is the mystery on which you've set
your sights, I've no doubt you will solve it.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_006_CUT_000_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_006_CUT_000_030.text:
And that is what makes you
the successors to Safed.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_006_CUT_000_040.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_006_CUT_000_040.text:
Then I cannot give you
this memento of Safed.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_006_CUT_000_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_006_CUT_000_050.text:
Your death was not in vain,
my dear Safed!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_006_CUT_000_070.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_006_CUT_000_070.text:
It's just a vision, Bonnie.
That wasn't the real Byaku.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_006_CUT_000_090.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_006_CUT_000_090.text: You're not malignancies at all. You're incompetencies!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_006_CUT_100_000.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_006_CUT_100_000.text:
This was mixed in with my deliveries,
but it didn't have an address.
Are you sure you want to take it?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_006_CUT_100_030.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_006_CUT_100_030.text: I figured as much. Good luck!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_006_CUT_100_040.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_006_CUT_100_040.text: In a way, that might be smart.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_006_CUT_100_050.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_006_CUT_100_050.text:
Great work as always, you two.
I guess you really are worthy.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_006_CUT_100_060.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_006_CUT_100_060.text: What do you mean? Worthy of what?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_006_CUT_100_070.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_006_CUT_100_070.text:
It's just a vision, Bonnie.
That isn't the real Erytheia.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_006_CUT_100_090.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_006_CUT_100_090.text:
Hey, if anyone knows that deliveries
