sometimes don't go as planned, it's me!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_007_CUT_000_000.speaker: SoulSprite
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_007_CUT_000_000.text:
The Four Tribes will keep piling stones
for all eternity. Only a Soul Voyager
can hope to stop them.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_007_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_007_CUT_000_010.text: I'll make you knock it off!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_007_CUT_000_030.speaker: SoulSprite
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_007_CUT_000_030.text: Still you watch over the Four Tribes.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_007_CUT_000_040.speaker: SoulSprite
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_007_CUT_000_040.text:
So you have turned your back
upon the Four Tribes.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_007_CUT_000_050.speaker: SoulSprite
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_007_CUT_000_050.text:
The Four Tribes have been freed!
Freed from Quisstatium!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_007_CUT_000_060.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_007_CUT_000_060.text:
This is just a dang vision, though!
They ain't been freed from nothin'!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_007_CUT_000_070.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_007_CUT_000_070.text:
Correct. So we must continue moving forward,
protecting our own country by solving the
mystery of Quisstatium. That is all we can do.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_007_CUT_000_090.speaker: SoulSprite
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_007_CUT_000_090.text:
You may try this again.
You may try over and over.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_008_CUT_000_000.speaker: Taupe_Mole
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_008_CUT_000_000.text:
Stop! I'm not an offering!
I... I taste awful!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_008_CUT_000_050.speaker: Taupe_Mole
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_008_CUT_000_050.text:
I'm so glad I didn't have to become
a mushroom. I really owe you one.
Well then, catch you later!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_008_CUT_000_060.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_008_CUT_000_060.text: It's good we were able to save Tope.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_008_CUT_000_070.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_008_CUT_000_070.text:
Even knowing this is just a vision,
I didn't want to see Tope get shroomed.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_008_CUT_000_090.speaker: Taupe_Mole
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_008_CUT_000_090.text: Gaaah! I'm gonna be a mushroom!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_008_CUT_100_000.speaker: Taupe_Mole
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_008_CUT_100_000.text:
Stop! I'm not a seedbed!
I have no nutritional value!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_008_CUT_200_000.speaker: Taupe_Mole
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_008_CUT_200_000.text: Stop! I'm not feed! Toys hate me!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_010_CUT_000_000.text:
Please forgive me, I'm begging you!
I'll do anything—I just don't want
to be experimented on! Pleeease!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_010_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_010_CUT_000_050.text:
This is what made lying on that lab table
so uncomfortable! ...Ow. Still hurts.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_010_CUT_000_060.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_010_CUT_000_060.text: Was this real, or some kind of joke?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_010_CUT_000_070.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_010_CUT_000_070.text:
It's just a vision, Bonnie. That person's
barely even acting like the real Mags.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_010_CUT_100_000.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_010_CUT_100_000.text:
And now to begin our experiment.
You ready for this, aliens?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_010_CUT_100_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_010_CUT_100_020.text: I ain't playin' along with this vision.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_010_CUT_100_030.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_010_CUT_100_030.text:
This is what I love about you aliens:
you're SO open-minded! Well, I prepared
a fine reward, so give me your very best.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_010_CUT_100_040.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_010_CUT_100_040.text: Damn! Is my experiment a failure!?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_010_CUT_100_050.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_010_CUT_100_050.text:
That was some impressive data I gathered.
You know, the two of you really should
consider joining Quisstatium!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_010_CUT_100_060.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_010_CUT_100_060.text:
So you ARE in Crass Titanium!
I knew it!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_010_CUT_100_070.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_010_CUT_100_070.text:
It's just a vision, Bonnie.
That's not the real overseer.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_010_CUT_200_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_010_CUT_200_000.text:
Oh! I wasn't expecting you aliens to return
to Delta Base. As this could expose us to
danger, you'll need to be removed.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_010_CUT_200_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_010_CUT_200_010.text: Off to the repair shop with you!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_010_CUT_200_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_010_CUT_200_020.text: Eh, it's just a vision. Go ahead.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_010_CUT_200_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_010_CUT_200_030.text:
Cultural contamination is a serious problem.
Your respect for this issue is insufficient!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_010_CUT_200_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_010_CUT_200_050.text:
I failed to stop the aliens' cultural
contamination! Initiating self-destruct!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_010_CUT_200_070.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_010_CUT_200_070.text:
It's just a vision, Bonnie.
Bean isn't like that in real life.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_011_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowF
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_011_CUT_000_000.text:
To think I'd run into people bearing
triangles in a place like this.
It's really quite the coincidence! I was so charmed by the unique peculiarities
of this world, Kamala—or rather, I should say,
I was so charmed by the taste of Epuyke pollen—
that I arranged a long-term posting here. Tell me, then! Do you know the true
identity of the Epuyke's maiden?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_011_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_011_CUT_000_010.text: Shut up and gimme your triangle!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_011_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowF
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_011_CUT_000_030.text:
Be not so hasty, fair travelers! Did you know
that what Ancikar fiends provide in terms of
nutrition is comparable to nothing less than
Epuyke's own life energy? One may therefore conclude that Ancikar
and Epuyke sprang from—and are even
competing for—the same roots!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_011_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowF
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_011_CUT_000_040.text:
Oh, but it has been so long since I've
had anyone to speak to! Just think of
the conversations we could have had!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_011_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowF
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_011_CUT_000_050.text:
But do you not agree that my theories have been
proven correct? That Ancikar and Epuyke—as well
as the Imeru and Kikir who live alongside them—
are all born from the same root? In fact, the ENTIRETY of Kamala is but
a giant flower born from a single root!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_011_CUT_000_060.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_011_CUT_000_060.text:
Whatever it is you're trying to prove, it ain't
gonna change nothin' about how folks in Kamala
think and feel. The next maiden and Soyay are
still gonna pursue their trials.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_011_CUT_000_070.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_011_CUT_000_070.text:
It was just a vision, Bonnie.
...But also more than that?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_012_CUT_000_000.speaker: LastEmperor
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_012_CUT_000_000.text:
Why have you come to Grelon?
What do you seek? You will answer me directly,
and with all speed!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_012_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_012_CUT_000_020.text: We don't want nothin' from you.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_012_CUT_000_030.speaker: LastEmperor
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_012_CUT_000_030.text:
Your greed runs deep. So be it!
Claim your triangle, if you can.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_012_CUT_000_040.speaker: LastEmperor
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_012_CUT_000_040.text:
I'll not waste my time with those devoid
of ambition. Begone from my sight!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_012_CUT_000_050.speaker: LastEmperor
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_012_CUT_000_050.text:
Your Quisstatium is a most impressive group.
They know much about how to access the power
of these triangles that we do not—and I would
very much like to share in that knowledge.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_012_CUT_000_060.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_012_CUT_000_060.text: We ain't part of Kiss Stadium!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_012_CUT_000_070.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_012_CUT_000_070.text:
I know this is only a vision, but could
it have actually happened long ago?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_013_CUT_000_000.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_013_CUT_000_000.text:
The triangle is in my scarecrow heart. ♥
Take my ♥ with you!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_013_CUT_000_030.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_013_CUT_000_030.text:
Awww, a direct confession of love.
This is the happiest day of my life! ♥

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_013_CUT_000_060.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_013_CUT_000_060.text:
All these ♥'s are makin'
my dang eyes bleed...

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_013_CUT_000_070.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_013_CUT_000_070.text:
It's just a vision, Bonnie.
These aren't real ♥'s.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_013_CUT_100_000.speaker: Spookcrow
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_013_CUT_100_000.text: THE TRIANGLES ARE THE SCARECROWS! I'M THE TRIANGLE, BUDDY!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_013_CUT_100_060.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_013_CUT_100_060.text: Nothing to do with what? Chris Tamium?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_013_CUT_100_070.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_013_CUT_100_070.text:
It's just a vision, Bonnie—
although Spookcrow's gonna Spookcrow.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_013_CUT_200_000.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_013_CUT_200_000.text:
There is but a den of fiends inside.
You're better off staying here. Woe!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_013_CUT_200_030.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_013_CUT_200_030.text:
I tell you, there's nothing inside.
O lamentation!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_013_CUT_200_050.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_013_CUT_200_050.text:
Heartache! A triangle has come to reside
within me now that the fiends are gone!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_013_CUT_200_070.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_013_CUT_200_070.text:
It's just a vision, Bonnie—but let's
take extra good care of this triangle
all the same.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_013_CUT_300_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_013_CUT_300_020.text: This is a right bad idea.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_013_CUT_300_050.speaker: Strangecrow
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_013_CUT_300_050.text:
Quisstatium. They who build the roads.
But where exactly do those roads lead?
Even we scarecrows do not know.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_013_CUT_300_070.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_013_CUT_300_070.text:
It's just a vision, Bonnie. Still, we should be
questioning whether the path these triangles
are sending us on is the right one or not.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_015_CUT_000_000.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_015_CUT_000_000.text:
I'm an exceptionally bright guy, right!?
Don't you think I belong in Quisstatium!?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_015_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_015_CUT_000_020.text: You're dumb as a sack'a hammers.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_015_CUT_000_030.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_015_CUT_000_030.text:
Yes! Of course I do! Therefore, I will
be taking all the triangles from you!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_015_CUT_000_040.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_015_CUT_000_040.text:
It appears you two are terribly
poor judges of character!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_015_CUT_000_050.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_015_CUT_000_050.text:
Ew! You got your dirty hands
all over me!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_015_CUT_000_060.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_015_CUT_000_060.text:
If this here's the sort of feller who's
Quissy Totem material, they can't be
much of an organization.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_015_CUT_000_070.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_015_CUT_000_070.text:
It's just a vision, Bonnie.
This doesn't tell us anything
about the real Quisstatium.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_015_CUT_000_090.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_015_CUT_000_090.text: HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_017_CUT_000_000.speaker: Buccaneer
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_017_CUT_000_000.text:
Yar, I got the three-pointed treasure!
There be no prize I can't be findin'!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_017_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_017_CUT_000_020.text: Now that just can't be true.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_017_CUT_000_030.speaker: Buccaneer
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_017_CUT_000_030.text:
Ye be the last people I'd suspect of such
treachery! If ye want the treasure, ye must
trade for it—so go find me a treasure of
equivalent value, by gar!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_017_CUT_000_060.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_017_CUT_000_060.text:
Was that really a treasure
equal in value to a triangle?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_017_CUT_000_070.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_017_CUT_000_070.text:
It's just a vision, Bonnie.
Worth doesn't mean anything.

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_017_CUT_000_090.speaker: Buccaneer
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_017_CUT_000_090.text:
Ha! Pathetic! Ye got some
nerve callin' yerselves Seer!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_017_CUT_100_000.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_017_CUT_100_000.text: Have you found your triangle, Seer?

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_017_CUT_100_030.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_017_CUT_100_030.text:
Then please find it quickly, so you might
focus on the battle for Brighthome!

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_017_CUT_100_060.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_017_CUT_100_060.text:
We got what we came for, so there ain't
no reason to stay in Brighthome. But...

SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_017_CUT_100_070.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W14_EVAR_BOFO_017_CUT_100_070.text:
It's just a vision, Bonnie; the outcome
of this battle for Brighthome means
nothing to us. Let's get out of here.
